text:
I received this a couple of days ago :slightly_smiling_face: Can really recommend the course on HubSpot Academy, it was quite helpful for my day-to-day!

<https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers>
I passed mine Monday this week. Is there an option to download the certificate?
Yeah, go to the learning center, search for the course, and click "View certification"

Hi All,

           I have 65 contacts and I want to use a API that will be updated the all contacts.

            e,g city = "Cambridge" how I can do it ?

            Thanks in advance





Regards,

Muhammad Attique
Please don't send your request in each Channel !! Just choose the right one

to piggyback what Loic said. There are 1,913 people in this general channel alone. Many of us are very active, some of us even have our notifications set, we will see your message. Spamming does not encourage us to help.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/contacts-overview>

So question on Workflows and the timing delay on the flow. A quick example:
We are creating an email that will have two CTA's, a Yes and a No button. When someone clicks on the link for yes, they will be added to a list in the backend and the link will bring them to a landing page using smart content based on this membership.

my question is, how long will it take to add them to the list (instantly) or is there a small delay where the situation of the person clicking the link, going to the page and seeing the smart content will be faster than the workflow adding them to the list.
i applaud the dedication, though :slightly_smiling_face: took a few minutes to copy and paste that in each channel

Hey <@U2H3TT8F2> The delay is long enough that the Smart Content on the landing page won’t work reliably.  In my testing it works about a third of the time when you this kind of a set up.  It’s an async process so there is no guarantee
Generally the solution is the append a query param to the URL and us JS on the landing page to customize the experience
:+1: that was my next go to was the query param and hubl to switch out the form/msg on the page
thanks Zack
Anyone else having serious issues with HubSpot right now?  Any time I try to add an image in a page, it freezes the page completely
In the page editor?
Both page editor and design manager
trying to select a default image within a module
try it in incognito mode
No issue in incognito
wait.  I lied
What about logging out and logging back in?
seem like it either a caching issue OR you have a chome plugin screwing with you.
hmm... seems to be good now
:slightly_smiling_face:
oh man. I need to wait before I keep saying that.
:disappointed:
BTWs.. Happy Pi Day! :pizza:

I need your feedback. Our client have an event. We want to send to a specific group of people an email to inform of the event and ask if they want to subscribe to a specific newsletter. Then let's in 2 weeks if the people in list didn't fill in the form or unsubscribe to the mail, we would like to send a reminder e mail.
I could use an approach with two lists. One for all the people we want to target and the second with the people in the list who didn't fill out the form after 2 weeks. Then send 2 mails, one for each list.
I've also see that we can use sequences but since we didn't buy the sale package I don't know if it would be the solution for us. What do you think?
I could have sworn there was a way to move a post from one blog to another, can’t seem to find the option? EDIT - found it, it just wasn’t immediately obvious
I don't know if I'm following this correctly but were you already using workflows in sending emails and followups? If not, that could be a good place to start looking into.
Curious as well. By any chance - is there already a way as well to do this in bulk?
not in bulk, only works for an individual post, you go to the settings tab then you go to change the URL the domain/blog area becomes a dropdown and you pick the blog
no I'm not...I will take a look thanks
Right. I thought so. Thanks man!
i have asked support in the past about this.   and there seems to be no way of doing this in bulk
theoretically you could via api copy them but youd lose analytics
dont think api was on the mind of the support operator when we discussed :wink:
hahaha
true
I'm having trouble with URL Redirects. After I get this message, yet nothing has happened... :thinking_face:
Hey <@UATE4ATHP> you might want to check if your redirect has higher priority than the others perhaps?
They arent even getting added
Now that's something HubSpot needs to check with :eyes:
I did try this but this API execute Successfully and update only two records that I provided it by Vid and emailID. My question I want to update all the contacts
